verses.content: Chunawa khawm dârsen mâi- châm a siem bawk a, a dungtieng tawng sâwmhni, a khangtieng tawng sâwmhni; ân sângtieng chu tawng sâwm.
Chun, dâr tuizêng inbiel a sunga sungin, a reia inthawka rei khing- tieng tawng sâwm, intie vêl vawng, ân sângtieng tawng nga chu a siem bawk a; a rei a vêlin tawng sâwm- thum vêltuok a nih.
Chun, a rei hnuoia chun kumûm ang a vêla vêlsuok, tawng khat pei sâwm seng, tuizêng vêla chun a siem a. Kumûm lim chu tlar hni a na, tuizêng le chun sung kawp a nih.

Bâwngchal lim sâwmpahni chunga inṭhut a na, pathum chun hmârtieng an nghah a, pathumin simtieng, pathumin thlangtieng, pa- thum bawkin saktieng an nghah a; chu dâr tuizêng chu an chunga chun inṭhut a nih; an hnungtieng chun sûngtieng a ngha seng a.
Chun, kutpha bawka sa a na; a rei chu no rei anga siem a na, lili pâr angin, bath sâng thum dawng a nih.

Insâwpna dingin châwtawl sâwm a siem a, panga chu changtieng pang- ah a sieh a, panga dang chu vawi- tiengah; chuong thilhai chu pumraw- hmang thilinhlânhai kha sâwpnaah an hmang hlak a, tuizêng ruok chu thiempuhai ta dinga insâwpna a nih.
Chun, anni chungthua thupek angin rângkachak sathâu khâwnvar siena sâwm a siem a, chuonghai chu biek ina chun a sieh a, panga chu changtieng pangah, panga dang chu vawitiengah.
Chun, dawkân sâwm a siem a, biekina chun a sieh a, panga chu changtieng pangah, panga dang chu vawitiengah. Chun, rângkachak thlêngkûm za khat a siem bawk a.
Chu nawa khawm chun thiem- puhai tuolpûk le tuolpûk lien a siem a; chuong tuolpûk kawtkhârhai le chun, chuong kawtkhârhai chu dâr- senin ân luon khum a.
Chun, maihûn chu a in pangah simsaktieng chun ân ṭhut a.
Chun, Huram chun bêlhai, thlêngkûmhai le suodûrhai chu a siem a. Chun, Huram chun Pathien ina lal Solomon ta dinga a sinthaw chu a thaw zo tah a,
sûtpui pahnihai, maihûnhai, sûtpui lêrhaia a hmawrbâwkhai, sût- pui pahnihai lêra a hmawrbâwkhai inkûm inkhumna dinga ṭiel chik chek lênhai le;
chuong lên pahnihai ta dinga theibufai zalihai le lên pakhat sûtpui hai chunga hmawrbâwkhai inkûm inkhumna ta dinga theibufai tlar hni pei le chun.
Chun, suonkuolhai a siem a, châwtawlhai chu suonkuol chunga inṭhutin a siem a;
tuizêng pakhat chu a hnuoia bâwngchal sawmpahni leh.
Bêlhai, suodûrhai, sakuoikim- hai le chutaka bûr le bêlhai po po chu Huram chun LALPA ina ding chun dârsen tle miin lal Solomon ta ding chun a lo siem vawng a.
Zereda le Sukkoth inkâra tlak- pil hmuna khan Jordan Phairuomah lal chun a lo sung a na.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun hieng bûr le bêlhai po po hi tam tâwk takin a siem a, dârsen lem chu a bûk zât khawm hriet suok ruol a ni nawh a.
Chuongchun, Solomon chun Pathien ina bûr le bêlhai po po chu a siem a, rângkachak mâichâm le, entirna bei siena dawkânhai;
sathâu khâwnvar siena le a khâwnvarhai, hmun inthieng hmaa chun thupêk anga an chawk zing theina ding, rângkachak inthiengin a siem a;
a pârbâwrhai, khâwnvarhai, chaichehai, rângkachakin, rângka- chak inthiengin a siem a;
khâwnvar vâm chepnahai, châwtawlhai, haihâwhai, meilâkna- hai chu rângkachak inthieng bawkin; chun, in lûtna chu, hmun inthieng- taka kawtkhâr sûngril lem le, in kawtkhârhai chu rângkachak an nih.
